description: Borrowed from Latin explicāre, present active infinitive of explicō (“unfold, explain”).

adjectives.description: explicate (comparative more explicate, superlative most explicate)

verbs.description: explicate (third-person singular simple present explicates, present participle explicating, simple past and past participle explicated)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To explain meticulously or in great detail.
examples: My homework is to explicate a poem.
